trans-unit.source: A binding terminal that represents the flow of data into an activity.
The data type of the <xref href="System.Activities.InArgument`1"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.InArgument`1"></xref> class using default values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.InArgument`1"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Activity`1"></xref>.
The value of the argument.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.InArgument`1"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"></xref>.
The value of the argument.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.InArgument`1"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref>.
The data that is passed through this argument.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.InArgument`1"></xref> class using the specified expression.
The value of the argument.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.InArgument`1"></xref> class using the specified value.
The `constValue` parameter is shared across all workflow instances using this workflow definition.
For example, if a `List<string>` was provided as a `constValue` and three instances were created then all three instances would be accessing the same `List<string>`.
The value of the argument.
Gets an <xref href="System.Activities.Activity`1"></xref> that represents the value of this <xref href="System.Activities.InArgument`1"></xref>.
An activity that represents the value of the argument.
Initializes and returns a new <xref href="System.Activities.InArgument`1"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"></xref>.
The value of the argument.
The new argument.
Initializes and returns a new <xref href="System.Activities.InArgument`1"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Activity`1"></xref>.
The value of the argument.
The new argument.
Initializes and returns a new <xref href="System.Activities.InArgument`1"></xref> using the specified value.
The value of the argument,
The new argument.
Initializes and returns a new <xref href="System.Activities.InArgument`1"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref>.
The value of the argument.
The new argument.
Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Activities.InArgument`1"></xref> using the specified activity context.
The current activity context.
The value of the argument.
Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Activities.InArgument`1"></xref> using the specified value.
The current activity context.
The new value.
